alert.note: Alert for Cass; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 11:05AM EST until January 27 at 5:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Eel River at North Manchester affecting Miami, Kosciusko, Cass IN, Wabash and Whitley Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Williams, Fulton OH and Defiance Counties. .A combination of melted snowpack, recent and forecasted rainfall has resulted in rises along area rivers. For the Eel River...including North Manchester...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Tiffin River...including Stryker...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Eel River at North Manchester. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The river is at flood stage, minor agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM EST Friday was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 515 AM EST.
